results.name: Triangle read by rows, A000012 * A177445 * the diagonalized variant of A120562
formula: Triangle read by rows, M*Q*R; such that M = an infinite lower triangular matrix with
all 1's, Q = triangle A177444, and R = the diagonalized variant of A120562
(A120562 as the right diagonal and the rest zeros).
